Terms of Use Agreement

By accessing this website, you (“the user”) accept the current Terms of Use Agreement and agree with your responsibility for the compliance with any related local laws or regulations. Should you not agree with any part of these Terms, you do not have to use this website (“the platform”). All the materials contained on this platform are protected by copyright and trademark law. iXQUANT brand is the property of EMI-FT LTD. No content available on www.ixquant.com website can be reproduced without the prior written permission of the content owner - EMI-FT LTD.

1. Company details

EMI-FT LTD is a private limited liability company registered under Bulgarian law (company number 204.855.383). The registered office is located at 53-55 Gen. Eduard I. Totleben Boulevard, 1606 Sofia, Republic of Bulgaria. Email address to send your inquiries: hello@ixquant.com

2. Services description

iXQUANT platform allows the Users to perform a variety of trade simulations and create trading strategies with several financial instruments (options, futures, stocks, CFDs, etc.). Our platform uses widely accepted Black-Scholes model for options pricing simulation. No real-time market data is used in our options simulator.

3. Legal disclaimer

EMI-FT LTD is not a registered financial advisor and is not positioning itself as such. All the tools, information, and analysis provided through iXQUANT platform are intended to be for informative, educative, and analytical purposes only.

Under no circumstances this information must be considered as an incitement to trade or use the mentioned financial instruments in the management of your personal finances. Moreover, EMI-FT LTD cannot be held responsible for any eventual loss resulting from the user’s trading activity.

Certain financial instruments (e.g. CFDs - contracts for difference) mentioned on our platform might be prohibited from marketing and trading in some countries. Please, check your local regulations on this matter before using any such instrument and brokers offering them for trading.

All the options trade simulations made on iXQUANT platform represent hypothetical results of those trades. Simulated results do not represent actual trading. The actual trading results of such simulations may differ under the influence of various market factors (e.g. pace of change in implied volatility, amplitude in fluctuation of the underlying instrument, etc.).

4. Service cancellation and Refund Policy

When registering on iXQUANT platform, all Users are offered a 7-day fully functional free of charge access. Please, make sure that the services and functionalities available on the platform are suitable for your needs before taking a paid subscription.

To cancel the subscription, the User needs to send the cancelation request via email to hello@ixquant.com before the end of the current subscription period (e.g. month, quarter, year). The cancellation request will be processed, and the User will not be billed for the next billing period.

Refund in case of the subscription cancellation:

Monthly subscription (30-day subscription) - no refund possible. Subscription and billing will stop at the end of the current subscription period.

Quarterly subscription (3-month subscription) - All not started months will be refunded. Subscription and billing will stop at the end of the last billed month.

Annual subscription (4-quarter subscription) - All not started quarters will be refunded. Subscription and billing will stop at the end of the last billed quarter.

5. Modifications

EMI-FT LTD reserves the right to modify the current Terms of Use Agreement at any time without prior notice. The last update date will be indicated at the bottom of the current page.
